api_list.name: NSFW Image Classification
api_list.description: Use our Content Moderation API to flag possible inappropriate content in your images.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nsfw-image-classification1.p.rapidapi.com/img/nsfw"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nsfw-image-classification1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
